--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, DanielBook@a... wrote:
> I thought of that possibility as well.  It wouldn't be too hard for 
the archmage to be continually be pushing up against a cleric, 
constantly regaining health.

If I had powerfull cleric, I wouldn't be summoning fire elementals 
right away.  Dead enemy characters make excellent skeletons and 
ghosts. :-)
